author: vurso
body:
Installed the latest version of PowerShell 7 on a Windows 10 Professional desktop PC with the latest .NET Core and Framework SDK's already installed.

Starts up fine however when I then go into the settings and modify the background colour for example and then I try installing a module for example the terminal gets itself into a mess with the cursor appearing in a phantom location and terminal updates not appearing in the right place
